sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_f3ab52ea07e130106cd2fe4f7c1ed0b2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>global.TournamentFillBlanks</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Fills in the Location Blanks in the Tournament Entry forms</description><name>TournamentFillBlanks</name><script><![CDATA[var TournamentFillBlanks = Class.create();
TournamentFillBlanks.prototype = {
    initialize: function FillBlanks() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_tournament_locations');
		var locationName = this.getParameter('locationName');
		
		obj = {};
		
		if(gr.get(locationName))
		{
			obj.location = gr.getValue('u_location');
		}
		gs.addInfoMessage("Script Include" + obj);
		return JSON.stringify(obj);
    },

    type: 'TournamentFillBlanks'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>b_conradjr</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-27 18:56:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>f3ab52ea07e130106cd2fe4f7c1ed0b2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TournamentFillBlanks</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f3ab52ea07e130106cd2fe4f7c1ed0b2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>b_conradjr</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-27 20:12:39</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="9826c420079130106cd2fe4f7c1ed087" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Single Tournament Entry Application">0e8082ee076130106cd2fe4f7c1ed099</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e8410ae207a130106cd2fe4f7c1ed0fe</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Fill Location Address</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	var locationName = g_form.getValue('tournament_location');
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('global.TournamentFillBlanks');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'FillBlanks');
	ga.addParam('locationName', locationName);
	
	ga.getXMLAnswer(getResponse);
	
	function getResponse(response)
	{
		var res = JSON.parse(response);
		g_form.setValue('location_address', res.location);
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>b_conradjr</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-27 20:24:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>9826c420079130106cd2fe4f7c1ed087</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8c113e6e072530106cd2fe4f7c1ed0db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fill Location Address</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_8c113e6e072530106cd2fe4f7c1ed0db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>b_conradjr</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-27 20:28:07</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_31c8873607a130106cd2fe4f7c1ed009
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.FillSingleEntryTable</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>FillSingleEntryTable</name><script><![CDATA[var FillSingleEntryTable = Class.create();
FillSingleEntryTable.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	FillSingleEntryTable:function()
	{
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_single_entries');
		var name = this.getParameter('name');
		var origin = this.getParameter('origin');
		var location = this.getParameter('location');
		var address = this.getParameter('address');
		
		gr.initialize();
		gr.setValue('u_participant_name', name);
		gr.setValue('u_participant_origin', origin);
		gr.setValue('u_location_name', location);
		gr.setValue('u_location', address);
		gr.setValue('u_participant_number', 1);
		gr.setValue('u_tournament_type', 'Single Participant');
		gr.insert();
	},
    type: 'FillSingleEntryTable'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>b_conradjr</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 17:02:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>31c8873607a130106cd2fe4f7c1ed009</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FillSingleEntryTable</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_31c8873607a130106cd2fe4f7c1ed009</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>b_conradjr</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 17:02:00</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="9826c420079130106cd2fe4f7c1ed087" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Team Tournament Entry Application">9d74312a076130106cd2fe4f7c1ed0c3</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Add to Teams Table</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Send values to Team Entry Table
	var teamName = g_form.getValue('team_name');
	var participants = g_form.getValue('number_of_participants');
	var teamLocation = g_form.getValue('team_origin');
	var tourneyRef = g_form.getReference('tournament_location');
	var tourneyLocation = tourneyRef.getValue('u_location_name');
	var tourneyAddress = g_form.getValue('tournament_origin');
	
	alert(tourneyLocation);
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('global.FillTeamTable');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'FillTeamTable');
	ga.addParam('teamName', teamName);
	ga.addParam('participants', participants);
	ga.addParam('teamLocation', teamLocation);
	ga.addParam('tourneyLocation', tourneyLocation);
	ga.addParam('tourneyOrigin', tourneyAddress);
	
	
	ga.getXMLWait();
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>b_conradjr</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 04:10:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>9826c420079130106cd2fe4f7c1ed087</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6cba9c3207a930106cd2fe4f7c1ed041</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Add to Teams Table</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6cba9c3207a930106cd2fe4f7c1ed041</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>b_conradjr</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 20:19:58</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0bbb5c7207a930106cd2fe4f7c1ed0df
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.FillTeamTable</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>FillTeamTable</name><script><![CDATA[var FillTeamTable = Class.create();
FillTeamTable.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	FillTeamTable:function()
	{
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_team_entries');
		var teamName = this.getParameter('teamName');
		var participants = this.getParameter('participants');
		var teamOrigin = this.getParameter('teamOrigin');
		var tourneyLocation = this.getParameter('tourneyLocation');
		var tourneyOrigin = this.getParameter('tourneyOrigin');
		
		gr.initialize();
		gr.setValue('u_team_name', teamName);
		gr.setValue('u_team_origin', teamOrigin);
		gr.setValue('u_participants', participants);
		gr.setValue('u_location_name', tourneyLocation);
		gr.setValue('u_location',tourneyOrigin);
		gr.setValue('u_tournament_type', 'Team Tournament');
		gr.insert();
		
	},
    type: 'FillTeamTable'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>b_conradjr</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 04:12:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>0bbb5c7207a930106cd2fe4f7c1ed0df</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FillTeamTable</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0bbb5c7207a930106cd2fe4f7c1ed0df</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>b_conradjr</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 14:53:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="9826c420079130106cd2fe4f7c1ed087" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Single Tournament Entry Application">0e8082ee076130106cd2fe4f7c1ed099</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Add to Single Entry Table</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Send to Single Entry Table
	
	var name = g_form.getValue('participant_name');
	var origin = g_form.getValue('participant_origin');
	var locateRef = g_form.getReference('tournament_location');
	var location = locateRef.getValue('u_location_name');
	var address = g_form.getValue('location_address');
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('global.FillSingleEntryTable');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'FillSingleEntryTable');
	ga.addParam('name', name);
	ga.addParam('origin', origin);
	ga.addParam('location', location);
	ga.addParam('address', address);
	
	ga.getXMLWait();
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>b_conradjr</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 16:52:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>9826c420079130106cd2fe4f7c1ed087</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>65a8cb3607a130106cd2fe4f7c1ed00c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Add to Single Entry Table</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_65a8cb3607a130106cd2fe4f7c1ed00c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>b_conradjr</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 20:24:43</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_047e226a072530106cd2fe4f7c1ed076
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TournamentFillBlanks</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>TournamentFillBlanks</name><script><![CDATA[var TournamentFillBlanks = Class.create();
TournamentFillBlanks.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	FillBlanks:function () {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_tournament_locations');
		var locationName = this.getParameter('locationName');
		
		obj = {};
		
		if(gr.get(locationName))
		{
			obj.location = gr.getValue('u_location');
		}
		return JSON.stringify(obj);
    },
	
    type: 'TournamentFillBlanks'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>b_conradjr</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-27 20:15:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>047e226a072530106cd2fe4f7c1ed076</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TournamentFillBlanks</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_047e226a072530106cd2fe4f7c1ed076</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>b_conradjr</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-27 20:23:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_f00dd6ea07e130106cd2fe4f7c1ed0d1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="9826c420079130106cd2fe4f7c1ed087" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Team Tournament Entry Application">9d74312a076130106cd2fe4f7c1ed0c3</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:5825312a076130106cd2fe4f7c1ed0f6</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Fill Location Origin </name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	var locationName = g_form.getValue('tournament_location');
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('global.TournamentFillBlanks');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'FillBlanks'); //Function Call
	ga.addParam('locationName', locationName); //Parameter(s) in the script include
	
	ga.getXMLAnswer(getResponse);
	
	function getResponse(response)
	{
		var res = JSON.parse(response);
		g_form.setValue('tournament_origin', res.location);
	}
